entry.title: WIND WARNING , Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening then southeast 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 in the morning. High 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Windy. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Windy. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
